title: 2B/2B, Polished kitchen countertops, Onsite playground
posting_body: ['Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Feet:', '946', 'Address:', '2001 Ramrod Ave', 'South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', 'Amenities Include:', 'Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', 'Onsite playground', 'Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity', 'Controlled-entry access', 'Polished kitchen countertops', 'Separate dining area', 'Wood-style plank flooring', 'Oversized walk-in closets', 'Ceiling fans in dining room', 'Professional onsite management', 'Resident social lounge', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing OpportunityPrices Change DailyFlexible Lease Terms']
